thread.title: Trump: Ambassador Churkin played key role in working with US on global security issues
thread.title_full: Trump: Ambassador Churkin played key role in working with US on global security issues

author: RT
title: Trump: Ambassador Churkin played key role in working with US on global security issues
text:
Trump: Ambassador Churkin played key role in working with US on global security issues   22:08 Edited time: 21 Feb, 2017 22:21 Get short URL Vitaly Churkin. © Stan Honda / AFP US President Donald Trump has issued condolences over the death of Russia UN ambassador Vitaly Churkin, saying the diplomat played a “crucial” role in working with the US to tackle global security challenges. 
“President Donald J. Trump was saddened to learn of the unexpected death of Russia’s Permanent Representative to the United Nations, Vitaly Churkin,” a statement released by the White House said, calling the Russian official “an accomplished diplomat.” NEW: Pres. Trump offers condolences over sudden death of Vitaly Churkin, Russian ambassador to the U.N. https://t.co/Xu2k4e2gMX pic.twitter.com/BrWbIVEYYr — ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 21, 2017 
The announcement noted that despite different approaches on a number of issues, Churkin had played a “crucial” role in countering challenges to international security. 
”While American officials sometimes disagreed with their Russian counterparts, Ambassador Churkin played a crucial role in working with the United States on a number of key issues to advance global security. The President offers the condolences of the American people to the Russian people and government.” 
Vitaly Churkin, who served as Russia's permanent representative to the United Nations since 2006, died suddenly while at work in New York, on Monday. 
He would have turned 65 on Tuesday.
